definition: Yan'an prefecture level city in Shaanxi, communist headquarters during the war
surname Yan
to prolong/to extend/to delay
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
surname An
Yán'ān prefecture level city in Shaanxi 陝西|陕西, communist headquarters during the war
Yan'an prefecture, Shaanxi

sentences.english: In new century, there is a valuable topic that rethinks of history of the research of Yan'an literature.
sentences.chinese: 新世紀，回眸延安文學研究是一個有價值的話題。

sentences.english: Mr. Rittenberg took his wife to Yan’an last year.
sentences.chinese: 李敦白先生去年帶夫人到了延安。

sentences.english: I think our numerous meetings in Yenan to promote constitutional government have a twofold purpose.
sentences.chinese: 我以爲我們延安的許多促進會，有兩個意義。

sentences.english: What we do in Yenan is bound to influence the whole country.
sentences.chinese: 延安的舉動，不能不影響全國。

sentences.english: With the method of drying by silica gel, Robinia pseudoacacia seed of Yan an City and Wuqi City were dried from 6.
sentences.chinese: 採用硅膠室溫乾燥法，延安種源刺槐種子含水量由6。

sentences.english: Yan'an Spirit is the fine tradition and precious heritage of our party.
sentences.chinese: 延安精神是我們黨的優良傳統和寶貴財富。

sentences.english: In January 1941, yanan economic extremely difficult.
The people of Yenan live in cave houses carved into the slopes of dry loessial hills.
sentences.chinese: 延安人住在乾燥的黃土山坡上挖的窯洞裏。

sentences.english: Yan’an is identified as the cradle of China revolution.
sentences.chinese: 延安被看作是中國革命的搖籃。

sentences.english: Yan'an is the revolutionary holy land of china.
sentences.chinese: 延安是中國革命的聖地。

sentences.english: Let me cite a few examples from Yenan.
sentences.chinese: 讓我舉一些延安的例子。

sentences.english: This paper regards the suburb of Yan'an city as its study object.
sentences.chinese: 本文將延安市城郊作爲研究對象。

sentences.english: YanAn Liberation Daily carried a large number of advertisement.
sentences.chinese: 延安時期的《解放日報》刊發過大量廣告。

sentences.english: What’s more, Hu welcomed him back to Yan’an.
sentences.chinese: 而且，胡還表示歡迎他回延安看看。

sentences.english: They say the revolution was born in Yan'an. So was Hu Muying.
sentences.chinese: 人們都說革命誕生在延安，胡木英也是如此。

sentences.english: "Yanan Song" became the symbol of the spirit of Yan'an.
sentences.chinese: 《延安頌》由此成爲延安精神的象徵。
